name: The Love
description:
Content


"Love" is a pixel game with love as its theme. It describes the love course, miss of Lu and Bo.
But it is not only about love, but also about our desire for love and our pursuit of the future.
But in the face of cruel reality, we may be as helpless as they are.

Story

Lu met Bo in a part-time job as a waiter, and their feelings quickly warmed up.
Because her family was poor, she had to work part-time to earn a living while she was studying.
On an appointment in the park, Bo helped her when she knew the situation.
Bo told her not to do those jobs again.
Because Lu wanted to rely on herself, she didn't listen to Bo's words.
After that, Bo often went to the bar where Lu worked.
When they overcome their difficulties and are going to get married soon.
But Bo got a message that he couldn't accept...

characteristics


* Warm Art Style
* A complete touching story
* An unexpected ending to the story
